layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#CCCCCC]
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 363x17
          text run at (0,0) width 363: "The style declarations which apply to the text below are:"
      RenderBlock {PRE} at (0,34) size 784x45
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 250x45
          text run at (0,0) width 250: ".one {font-variant: small-caps;}"
          text run at (249,0) width 1: " "
          text run at (0,15) width 219: ".two {font-variant: normal;}"
          text run at (218,15) width 1: " "
          text run at (0,30) width 0: " "
      RenderBlock {HR} at (0,92) size 784x2 [border: (1px inset #EEEEEE)]
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,110) size 784x18
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 267x17
          text run at (0,0) width 267: "This Paragraph should be in Small Caps."
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,144) size 784x18
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 570x17
          text run at (0,0) width 570: "This Paragraph should be in Small Caps, but the Last Word in the Sentence should be "
        RenderInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 49x17
          RenderText {#text} at (569,0) size 49x17
            text run at (569,0) width 49: "Normal"
        RenderText {#text} at (617,0) size 5x17
          text run at (617,0) width 5: "."
      RenderTable {TABLE} at (0,178) size 644x88 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        RenderTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 642x86
          RenderTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 642x26
            RenderTableCell {TD} at (0,0) size 642x26 [bgcolor=#C0C0C0] [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=2]
              RenderInline {STRONG} at (0,0) size 163x17
                RenderText {#text} at (4,4) size 163x17
                  text run at (4,4) width 163: "TABLE Testing Section"
          RenderTableRow {TR} at (0,26) size 642x60

                text run at (4,4) width 4: " "
